landing.subtitle: Secure and Transparent Voting Platform
landing.featureSubtitle: A secure and transparent platform for all your voting needs
landing.feature1Desc: Your unique facial features provide robust security against unauthorized access
landing.feature2Desc: Intuitive interface designed for quick and easy voting across devices
landing.feature3Desc: Change password in seconds with your unique facial features
landing.feature4Desc: Built with advanced algorithms for accurate and dependable voting
landing.aboutPara1: Our platform was founded on the principle that voting deserves the highest level of security and convenience. We believe technology can empower voters and build trust in democratic processes.
landing.aboutPara2: Our system utilizes cutting-edge security techniques to create a voting process that is not only secure but also fast and easy to use. We are committed to continuous improvement and protecting voter privacy.
landing.teamSubtitle: The minds behind the secure voting platform

auth.faceIdGuideExpressions: Maintain a neutral expression and ensure your face is clearly visible without obstruction.

elections.title: Elections
elections.candidateBasedHelp: Elect a candidate from a list of applicants. Candidates must apply and be approved in "Pending" status.
elections.yesNoHelp: Simple yes/no vote on a proposition. No approval needed, status starts as "Active".
elections.ratingHelp: Rate a proposition on a 1-5 scale. No approval needed, status starts as "Active".
elections.imageBasedHelp: Select from image options. No approval needed, status starts as "Active".
elections.propositionPlaceholder: e.g., Should we approve the new budget?
elections.propositionRequired: Proposition is required for Yes/No elections.
elections.ratingPropositionPlaceholder: e.g., How would you rate this candidate's performance?
elections.ratingPropositionRequired: Proposition is required for Rating elections.
elections.ratingSystemInfo: This election will use a 5-star rating system.
elections.ratingScaleInfo: Voters can rate from 1 star ({{min}}) to 5 stars ({{max}}).
elections.imageEditingDisabled: Image editing has been disabled. You can only edit election details.
elections.label: Label
elections.candidateStatusHelp: Set the current state. 'Pending' allows candidate applications. 'Active' allows voting.
elections.nonCandidateStatusHelp: Set the current state. 'Active' allows voting. Non-candidate elections don't have 'Pending' status.
elections.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in Title, Start Date, End Date, and select a Status.
elections.endDateMustBeAfterStartDate: End Date must be after Start Date.

userConduct.title: User Conduct
userConduct.description: At VoteChain, we believe in maintaining a respectful and fair environment for all users. Please adhere to the following conduct guidelines:
respectfulBehaviorItems: Treat all users with respect and courtesy
Do not engage in harassment, hate speech, or discriminatory behavior
Avoid personal attacks or inflammatory language
accountSecurityItems: Never share your password or account access
Log out when using shared devices
contentGuidelinesItems: All content must comply with local, state, and federal laws
Do not post misleading or false information
Ensure candidate profiles and statements are accurate
Respect intellectual property rights when uploading content

electionRules.title: Election Rules
electionRules.description: Our platform supports various types of elections, each with specific rules to ensure fairness and transparency:
electionCreationItems: Only administrators can create new elections
Elections must have clear titles, descriptions, and timeframes
Election details cannot be modified once voting has begun
Administrators must verify candidate eligibility before approval
candidateRequirementsItems: Candidates must register with complete and accurate information
CVs and supporting documents must be authentic and verifiable
Candidates must adhere to election-specific application deadlines
Platform statements must comply with content guidelines
electionTypesItems: Yes/No: Voting on a single proposition or candidate
Rating: Evaluating options on a numerical scale

votingGuidelines.title: Voting Guidelines
votingGuidelines.description: To maintain the integrity of our voting system, please follow these guidelines:
voterEligibilityItems: Voters must have a verified account to participate
Specific elections may have additional eligibility requirements
Administrators may restrict voting to certain user groups
votingProcessItems: Each user may vote only once per election
Votes cannot be changed after submission
Vote totals are not visible until an election concludes
User verification via Face ID may be required before voting
voteSecurityItems: All votes are encrypted and securely stored
Vote data is anonymous and cannot be linked to individual users
Attempting to manipulate votes is prohibited and may result in account termination
Our system employs multiple security layers to prevent fraud

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: We take your privacy seriously. Here's how we handle your data:
dataCollectionItems: We collect personal information necessary for account creation and verification
Facial recognition data is stored securely for authentication purposes only
Usage data is collected to improve platform functionality
We do not sell your personal information to third parties
dataSecurityItems: All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest
Access to personal data is strictly limited
Regular security audits are conducted to ensure data protection
userRightsItems: You can request a copy of your personal data
You may request deletion of your account and associated data
You can opt out of non-essential communications
You can update or correct your personal information at any time

termsOfService.title: Terms of Service
termsOfService.description: By using VoteChain, you agree to the following terms:
platformUseItems: You may not use the platform for any illegal purposes
You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account
We reserve the right to terminate accounts that violate our policies
The platform is provided "as is" without warranties
limitationsItems: We are not responsible for user-generated content
We may modify or discontinue services with reasonable notice
We reserve the right to update these terms at any time
Users will be notified of significant changes to these policies

contact.title: Questions or Concerns?
contact.description: If you have any questions about our policies or need to report a violation, please contact us at
